section.description: The example below shows how to use the .change_record() method:
section.example:
'DIM a dot variable with properties that match the fieldnames you want to change dim r as p r.firstname = "" r.company = "alpha" v = t.change_record(r) ?v.has_errors = .T. ?v.error.size() = 2
?v.Format("$(field) = $(error)"+crlf()) = CUSTOMER1->COMPANY = company can't be alpha CUSTOMER1->LASTNAME = Field is required: LASTNAME
